physical_appearance: This is an embroidered tunic. It has mid-length sleeves. It is multicolored, with various coloured panellings and embroidered designs. It has a small square collar.
sgcool_label_text: This is a tunic or chola, worn traditionally in the Sindh region of Pakistan. The tunic would have been made for a woman, to be worn for special occasions.
subject_terms_1: folk costume geometric motifs embroidery (visual works) tops (garments, general) blouses (main garments) ceremonial costume
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Tunics Motifs Embroidery Sindhi (South Asian people) Blouses
